speaker: President. −
english: President. − The next item is the report ( A6-0289/2008 ) by Proinsias De Rossa, on behalf of the Committee on Petitions, on the Special Report from the European Ombudsman to the European Parliament following the draft recommendation to the European Commission in complaint 3453/2005/GG ( 2007/2264(INI) ).
original: President. − The next item is the report ( A6-0289/2008 ) by Proinsias De Rossa, on behalf of the Committee on Petitions, on the Special Report from the European Ombudsman to the European Parliament following the draft recommendation to the European Commission in complaint 3453/2005/GG ( 2007/2264(INI) ).
agenda_item: Special Report from the European Ombudsman following the draft recommendation to the European Commission in complaint 3453/2005/GG (debate)
